ComicInfo.Title: The Cure For You; Wreckreation
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jennika journeys deeper into the NYC underworld in search of a dangerous procedure to reverse mutation. Will Jennika be tempted by the call of her old life, and how far will she go to save those who gave up on her long ago?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Brahm Revel | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Lauren Walsh | 2 | RE | IDW Convention Exclusive Variant Cover | Jodi Nishijima | 3 | RE | Frankies Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Alan Quah | 4 | RE | Frankies Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Black & White Virgin) | Alan Quah | 5 |
